content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court dissolved a marriage and divided the parties property the defendant was awarded various personal items while the applicant was awarded an audi car the defendant was also ordered to pay compensation to the applicant the court discussed the right to receive compensation the determination of asset value and the concept of shareable property the court considered evidence provided by both parties and made decisions based on the circumstances the court partially agreed with the counterclaim made by the applicant and dissolved the marriage the court also addressed the parties obligations towards creditors and determined the costs of the proceedings
